post.body: yay! is that SLT or GMT 1:00?
@Lactose Good to know! Don't know when they'll show it here....next christmas? /sighs....wish i could watch it now!
- I'll kick 'is arse for ya!
The nose knows! /my god kitty's are cute!
FINALLY finished installing Adobe CS4 & OMG it's called CS4 cuz it takes 4 hours to install-sitting in front of laptop & watching paint dry
Can't sleep, gonna try installing CS4 again, had problems first time. /yaawn...
best gift this year? AWESOME orange blossom perfume from Paris(snerk) and my brother got me a 3D connexion mouse, which is funky to use ;-)
however, it's CS4 dammit! ;-)
Off to walk with doggies me thinks. Then i'm trying to install Adobe CS 4 which came in broken CD case from factory, ;-( pooh!
oh man...someone tell me how Christmas Who was? Was it insanely silly? Were there any good bits? Incommunicado here!
Working in PS. Waiting for Mom to deliver groceries and my job as cook to begin. Hugs back to Fuschia and Alfonso! :-)
Off to brave the shopping malls wi the heroicly stoic Stanley. RL shopping is hell but sombody's got to do it! Merry Xmas folks!
scarfed restants of lunch and off to walk dingoes wi Stanley. ;-)
/carefully avoids GIANT pile of Stinky socks in front of washer....holding nose...Eeeeewwww!
Just finished "acting" in caledon christmas carol. GOD that was fun! my first acting job! I'm hooked on ham! :-)
On da road again after awesome lunch @ marisol rest. in pismo beach wi stanley
http://tinyurl.com/5ygpuz Cool Sailing Sims-like 130 of em all together!
What Number Are You? - http://tinyurl.com/5are4r - You Are 5: The Investigator #blogthings Ok..i did it Kira ;-)
Cleaning house, packing, getting ready for driving down to So Cal tomorrow to visit parental units :-)
is a My Little Pony avatar right now, wi a Caledon scarf, horns and wittle wings, farting flowers and making herself barf from cuteness!
